content:
Thomas de Zeeuw said:

I would like to add FreeBSD CI to https://github.com/rust-lang/socket2. Cirrus-CI provides FreeBSD machines and we've been using it for a couple of years for Mio (https://cirrus-ci.com/github/tokio-rs/mio). However there is some setup required to allow organisational access to the repo. Is there anyone here who could do that? A quick start guide is available here: https://cirrus-ci.org/guide/quick-start.

Moved here from t-libs based on a comment there.
@Pietro Albini or @simulacrum might know what's involved
It's on my todo list to take a look at this thread, just haven't had a chance yet. Maybe Pietro will have time earlier.
